rukus.text: brrda phu sraththa thanghlay cng cheuxfang xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh theid læa cng xya di phinhlanghı kæ khea khna thi phwk cea fang kan xyu
læa phwk cea xya pen chen brrda phu thi klaw wa phwk rea diyin læw nı khna deiyw kab phwk khea ha diyin mi
thæcring satw thi chaw ray ying n xallxhˌ nan khux phu thi hu hnwk thi pen bı sung pen phu thi mi chı payya

læa ha kxallxhˌ thrng ru wa nı taw phwk khea nan mi khwam di nænxn k ca thrng hı phwk khea diyin læa hak phraxngkh thrng hı phwk khea diyin læw nænxn phwk khea k phinhlanghı doythi phwk khea pen phu phinhlanghı xyu læw

brrda phu sraththa thanghlay cng tx brabxallxhˌ læa rx sul theid meux khea di cheiy chwn phwk cea su sing thi thahı phwk cea mi chiwitchiwa khun læa phung ru theid wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan ca thrng kan rahwang bukhkhl kab hawcı khxng khea læa thæcring yang phraxngkh nan phwk cea ca thuk na klab pi chumnum
Læa phwk cea cng rawang kar lngthosʹ sung man ca mi prasb kab brrda phu xthrrm nı hmu phwk cea doy chephaa theanan læa phung ru theid wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phu runræng nı kar lngthosʹ

læa phwk cea cng raluk khna thi phwk cea mi canwn nxy sung pen phu xxnxæ nı phændin doythi phwk cea klaw wa phukhn ca chob cheiyw phwk cea pi læw phraxngkh di thrng pord hı phwk cea mi thiphak phing læa di thrng snabsnun phwk cea dwy kar chwyhelux khxng phraxngkh læa di thrng prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea cak sing thi di «thanghlay pheux wa phwk cea ca di khxbkhun
brrda phu sraththa thanghlay cng xya thu crit tx xallxhˌ læa rx sul læa cng xya thucrit tx brrda khxng fak khxng phwk cea doythi phwk cea ru kan xyu
læa phung ru theid wa thæcring thraphysin khxng phwk cea læa luk «khxng phwk cea nan pen sing thdsxb chnid hnung theanan læa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan n phraxngkh mi rangwal xan hıy hlwng
